name: Ginger Banana Smoothie
description: A soothing smoothie made with ginger and banana, great for digestion and easing the stomach.
instructions: Peel the banana and add all ingredients to a blender.
cookingNote: Ginger helps with digestion and soothes the stomach, making this a great choice after meals.

name: Oatmeal with Honey and Almonds
description: A gentle and easy-to-digest snack made with oats, honey, and almonds, perfect for a sensitive stomach.
ingredients: 1/2 cup warm water or almond milk
instructions: Cook oats according to package instructions with warm water or almond milk.
Once cooked, top with honey and sliced almonds.
cookingNote: Oats are gentle on the stomach and provide a soothing texture for sensitive digestive systems.

name: Plain Rice Cakes with Avocado
description: Simple rice cakes topped with mashed avocado, offering a gentle, easy-to-digest snack option.
instructions: Mash the avocado and spread it evenly over the rice cakes.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper for flavor.
cookingNote: Avocado provides healthy fats and is easy to digest, making this snack ideal for sensitive stomachs.

name: Baked Sweet Potato Chips
description: A crunchy and gentle snack made from baked sweet potatoes, offering fiber and vitamins with easy digestion.
instructions: Toss sweet potato slices with olive oil and salt.
Arrange them in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, flipping halfway through, until crispy.
cookingNote: Sweet potatoes are high in fiber, which can help promote healthy digestion and is gentle on the stomach.

name: Cucumber and Yogurt Salad
description: A refreshing and cooling salad made with cucumber and yogurt, perfect for soothing the stomach.
instructions: Combine sliced cucumber and Greek yogurt in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.
cookingNote: Cucumber is hydrating and soothing, making this a light and easy-to-digest snack.
